original_text: So as soon as he had made an end of offering the burnt offering, Jehu said to the guard and to the officers, “Go in and strike them down; let not a man escape.” So when they put them to the sword, the guard and the officers cast them out and went into the inner room of the house of Baal,
korean_text: 번제 드리기를 다하매 예후가 호위병과 지휘관들에게 이르되 들어가서 한 사람도 나가지 못하게 하고 죽이라 하매 호위병과 지휘관들이 칼로 그들을 죽여 밖에 던지고

sentences.original_text: So as soon as he had made an end of offering the burnt offering,
Jehu said to the guard and to the officers,
Go in and strike them down;
So when they put them to the sword,
the guard and the officers cast them out
and went into the inner room of the house of Baal,
